Advantages of Crypto Blockchain
• *Security*: Highly resistant to hacking and
fraud due to cryptography and decentralization.
• *Transparency*: All transactions are publicly
verifiable.
• Efficiency: Reduces the need for
intermediaries, lowering costs and speeding up processes
